snippet.title: Hitori No Shita: The Outcast - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the thrilling trailer for the Hitori No Shita: The Outcast game, the video game adaptation of the mythical martial arts franchise, Hitori No Shita: The Outcast. The trailer has everything from creepy buildings and unsettling foes to action-packed gameplay. Check it out to see the game’s combat system, the Inhuman World, and more.

The Hitori No Shita: The Outcast game will be coming soon for Android and iOS mobile devices.

#IGN #Gaming #HitoriNoShita
